verses.name: Judges 13:11
verses.text: And Manoah arose, and went after his wife, and came to the man, and said unto him, Art thou the man that spakest unto the woman? And he said, I am.

verses.name: Judges 13:12
verses.text: And Manoah said, Now let thy words come to pass. How shall we order the child, and how shall we do unto him?

verses.name: Judges 13:13
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord said unto Manoah, Of all that I said unto the woman let her beware.
